name: Amity Bound
description:
When your caravan of traveling entertainers gets stuck in a rural town, you start to get to know some of the locals.

July 3, 2015: Small update containing minor text edits and smoother transitions before the ending credits.

July 27, 2015: Thanks for the positive feedback! Amity Bound was featured on the following sites:

  • Boing Boing Offworld
  • RelayFM Isometric Podcast
  • The best Mac games: Comedy Dating Sim Edition
